description:
Tried and true cartridge pads for Shimano® road brake calipers. Easy to install and ready for winter training or competition, these affordable pads are Shimano's standard for a reason.

  • Designed for alloy rims only. Not for use with carbon rims
  • Rubber compound is equally suited for competition or wet weather use
name: Shimano BR-9000 R55C4 Brake Shoes
